Class Trainer

java.lang.Object
domain.Trainer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MachineTrainer, PlayerTrainer

    • getInventory

      public Inventory getInventory()
      Gets the inventory of the trainer
      Returns:
      The trainer's inventory

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Gets the name of the trainer
      Returns:
      The trainer's name

    • getColor

      public Color getColor()
      Gets the color associated with the trainer
      Returns:
      The trainer's color

    • getPokemonInUse

      public Pokemon getPokemonInUse()
      Gets the current Pokemon in use by the trainer If the current Pokemon is null or not alive, tries to get the first alive Pokemon from the inventory
      Returns:
      The Pokemon currently in use, or null if no alive Pokemon is available

    • canStillFighting

      public boolean canStillFighting()
      Checks if the trainer can still participate in battle (has at least one Pokemon that can fight)
      Returns:
      true if the trainer can still fight, false otherwise

    • pokemonMovement

      public void pokemonMovement(Movement mov, Pokemon target) throws PoobkemonException
      Commands the current Pokemon to use a specific movement on a target
      Parameters:
      mov - The Movement object to use
      target - The target Pokemon
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the movement cannot be performed

    • pokemonMovement

      public void pokemonMovement(String mov, Pokemon target) throws PoobkemonException
      Commands the current Pokemon to use a movement by name on a target
      Parameters:
      mov - The name of the movement to use
      target - The target Pokemon
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the movement is not found or cannot be performed

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the Pokemon cannot be changed

    • decide

      public abstract String decide(Pokemon pok)
      Makes a decision for the trainer based on the opponent's Pokemon
      Parameters:
      pok - The opponent's Pokemon
      Returns:
      A string representing the decision made

      public void setPokemonInUse(Pokemon pokemonNew) throws PoobkemonException
      Sets the Pokemon currently in use by the trainer
      Parameters:
      pokemonNew - The Pokemon to set as currently in use
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the Pokemon is not alive

    • setPokemonInUse

      public void setPokemonInUse(String pokemonNew) throws PoobkemonException
      Sets the Pokemon currently in use by the trainer by name
      Parameters:
      pokemonNew - The name of the Pokemon to set as currently in use
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the Pokemon is not found or not alive

    • getPokemonByName

      public Pokemon getPokemonByName(String name) throws PoobkemonException
      Gets a Pokemon from the trainer's inventory by name
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Pokemon to retrieve
      Returns:
      The Pokemon object with the specified name
      Throws:
      PoobkemonException - If the Pokemon is not found
